animeDescription: Koyama Yuzu is running an antique shop. Mayu, a cat god (nekogami), is living off Yuzu and leads an idle life playing games. Lots of other gods visit Mayu and enjoy merrymaking.(Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Nekogami Yaoyorozu', 'Side story: Nekogami Yaoyorozu: Ohanami Ghostbusters']
